main_task:
Analyze the biotech research landscape in San Antonio, Texas. 
Research the major biotech companies, research institutions, and universities 
conducting biotech-related research. Create a comprehensive report that identifies 
potential partnership opportunities and gaps in the current ecosystem.

context.notes:
Focus areas:
- Pharmaceutical research
- Agricultural biotech
- Medical devices
- Gene therapy

Constraints:
- Only include organizations with active research programs
- Prioritize organizations with published research in the last 3 years
- Include funding information where available

Timeline: This analysis should be completable within a single session.

Notes:
- Web search may be needed to gather current information
- The initial CSV file contains a starter list that should be expanded
- Final report should be suitable for executive presentation

subtasks.title: Create starter list of biotech companies and institutions
subtasks.description: Fetch initial_companies.csv from a repository or create it by scraping the internet. For research_centers.json, fetch it from a known data source or create it from scratch.
subtasks.success_criteria: Initial_companies.csv and research_centers.json are created in data/inputs/

subtasks.title: Web search to gather current information on biotech companies and institutions
subtasks.description: Search online for the latest updates on biotech research in San Antonio. Use this information to expand initial_companies.csv.
subtasks.success_criteria: Updated initial_companies.csv is created in data/inputs/

subtasks.title: Extract research focus areas and published papers from online sources
subtasks.description: Use web scraping techniques to extract information on research focus areas (pharmaceuticals, agricultural biotech, medical devices, gene therapy) and published papers from the last 3 years. Update initial_companies.csv accordingly.
subtasks.success_criteria: Updated initial_companies.csv includes extracted research focus areas and published papers

subtasks.title: Clean and preprocess data for analysis
subtasks.description: Clean the extracted data by removing duplicates, handling missing values, and standardizing formats. Prepare it for analysis.
subtasks.success_criteria: Cleaned and preprocessed data is stored in data/inputs/

subtasks.title: Analyze and identify potential partnership opportunities
subtasks.description: Use the cleaned data to analyze research focus areas, published papers, funding information (if available), and other relevant factors. Identify potential partnership opportunities.

subtasks.title: Identify gaps in the current ecosystem
subtasks.description: Analyze research focus areas, published papers, and funding information to identify gaps in the current ecosystem.
subtasks.success_criteria: data/outputs/biotech_landscape.json is created with identified gaps

subtasks.title: Create comprehensive report
subtasks.description: Use the identified partnership opportunities and gaps in the current ecosystem to create a comprehensive report suitable for executive presentation.
